extension.name: ServiceU Event Listings
extension.author: Savvy Panda
extension.description: This module shows event listings from the ServiceU API. Can choose the latest events or specific ones to show.

field.name: display_num
field.label: Display #
field.description: The number of events to display

field.name: display_events
field.label: Display Events
field.description: Add the events_id for each event you want to display in a comma-separated list. If ids are entered here, the Display # limit is ignored.
